evidence.text: The mediation of this case that took place on Monday, October 28, 2024, resulted in a full and final settlement of all claims as to all parties subject to the final consideration and approval by the City of Fort Lauderdale City Commission.

evidence.location: ENTRY 194 - PAPERLESS ORDER Requiring Status Update
evidence.text: The parties have notified the Court that the proposed settlement in this matter was presented to the City Commission in a closed-door session on November 19, 2024, was approved by City officials, and will now be brought before the City Commission on a public agenda tentatively set for December 3, 2024 for final approval.
200 | 2024-12-23 | Order on Motion to Approve Consent Judgment
